description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. SHOOT through hundreds of foes and get your CREW to safety in this GANGSTA stylized shooter / platformer! Face soldiers, NINJAS, bombing runs, sand worms and a whole lot more. Your TIME field will make enemies an easy target and will save you from some DEADLY hazards. PLAY FIELDS RELOADED NOW!
